title: FS: T212 1911 Obak Coy SGC 50 SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: T212 1911 Obak Coy SGC 50 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi. I need funds for other purchases so this one has to go. A real beauty and my only 1911 I'm asking $85 (what I paid). I'll cover postage and DC. I prefer paypal (gift even better) but will take a mo or check if necessary. I guess I would consider a trade for T206 SGC graded 50-60 only (40 for HOF'ers). Send scans to [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] (that's the Paypal address too).
Thanks!
Traded, thanks Steve!

These are all SGC 50's. I'll trade any 2 for your Obak plus $15.
